pages.text: $(li)Cod are fish that can be found in $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/river)Rivers$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/swamp/swamp)Swamps$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/raw_cod)Raw Cod$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l) upon death.
